attributes.action: BRING IN THE BRITISH ARMY TO DEAL WITH THE RIOTERS!!!
attributes.additional_details:
BRING IN THE BRITISH ARMY TO DEAL WITH THE RIOTERS!!!

THUGS ARE BRINGING RIOTS IN TO DIFFERENT CITIES AND NEED SORTING OUT!!!

BRING IN THE ARMY TO DEAL WITH THEM THE PROPER WAY! WITH WATER CONONS, RUBBER BULLETS AND TEAR GAS!!!

ITALY, CHILE, GERMANY, FRANCE WOULD HAVE THEM DOING IT ALREADY!!!
